member.name: M:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.BufferFactory.CreateBuffer(Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.IBufferPointer)
member.summary: Create an IBuffer from an IBufferPointer.
member.param: A pointer to the data to wrap in an IBuffer.
member.returns: An IBuffer pointing to the same data as bufferPointer

member.name: T:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.BufferFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating an instance of IBuffer from an IBufferPointer.

member.name: P:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.IBufferPointer.Ptr
member.summary: A pointer to the buffer, cast to an int.

member.name: T:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.IBufferPointer
member.summary: A buffer represented by a pointer to a memory location and a length. Implementations can be used to create IBuffer objects using a BufferFactory.
